title: Notifications
description: Stay updated with your music activity

bookingNotification.accepted: {{bandName}} has accepted your booking request for {{eventName}}
bookingNotification.signed: The contract for {{eventName}} with {{bandName}} has been signed
bookingNotification.paid: Your payment for {{eventName}} with {{bandName}} has been received
bookingNotification.declined: {{bandName}} has declined your booking request for {{eventName}}
bookingNotification.canceled: Your booking for {{eventName}} with {{bandName}} has been canceled
bookingNotification.userSigned: You have signed the contract for {{eventName}} with {{bandName}}
